snippet: The Sara VanDerBeek show at Metro Pictures includes pictures of oxidized metal surfaces that are covered by semitransparent mirrored glass that reflects the rest of the room.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Metro Pictures gallery show of work of photographer Sara VanDerBeek.
lead_paragraph: The Sara VanDerBeek show at Metro Pictures includes pictures of oxidized metal surfaces that are covered by semitransparent mirrored glass that reflects the rest of the room.
